overview: Surfer Girlz Heat Wave interviews the world's best women surfers and even surfing legend Kelly Slater.  Surfer Girlz documents the the new generation of surfing women who are taking the sport into a new era of shredding.  From Lakey Peterson's 360 airs to Steph Gilmore's perfect carves even Kelly Slater is amazed at the state of the art surfing now done by the world's best women surfers. Filmed on location in Australia, Wadi and California.
tagline: Surfer Girlz Heat Wave interviews the world's best surfers, including Kelly Slater, Steph Gilmore, Carrisa Moore and Alana Blanchard and documents the state of the art surfing by world class surfing girlz.
title: Surfer Girlz - Heat Wave
